title: Spotify is getting desperate
selftext: Devs trying their best to make it as unussable as possible
comments: You can get their premium for free if you use myntra. I got it a couple of months ago and life is smooth since then
If you(or someone around) you used made some orders from myntra recently, then you can check the insider section of the myntra app which will have a free Spotify premium code
Yup, I have been using it since the last 8 months
